news.title: Bessent: TikTok deal 'framework' reached with China, Trump and Xi will finalize it Friday
news.summary: The U.S. and China have a 'framework' deal for social media platform TikTok in place, Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent says.

news.title: Trump advocates that companies stop reporting earnings on a quarterly basis
news.summary: Trump said the idea is "subject to SEC approval" and would "save money, and allow managers to focus on properly running their companies"

news.title: Tesla shares gain as Elon Musk reveals rare $1 billion stock buy in sign of confidence in EV maker
news.summary: It's the CEO's most significant purchase in the open market since 2020. It's also the first time the company has been able to buy a major asset in a decade.

news.title: China says Nvidia violated anti-monopoly law after preliminary probe
news.summary: China's market regulator on Monday said that Nvidia violated the country's anti-monopoly law in relation to its aquisition of Mellanox in 2020.

news.title: U.S. and Britain to sign flurry of major nuclear power deals during Trump’s state visit
news.summary: U.K. Prime Minister Keir Starmer said the proposed nuclear power pact would put the U.S. and U.k. “at the forefront of global innovation”

news.title: Tesla’s stock climbs after Musk sends this $1 billion vote of confidence
news.summary: Musk is making his first open-market purchase of shares since 2020. Tesla’s stock has underperformed this year, but Musk is putting more of his money where his mouth is.

news.title: Your financial plan looks like a winner. Do you really need a second opinion?
news.summary: An independent review can uncover gaps and help you build a more solid financial foundation. An independent review could uncover gaps in your financial plan. A review can also help you find ways to improve your current financial situation.

news.title: The dot-com era’s highest-profile analyst says there will be a big AI bust
news.summary: Star dot-com analyst Henry Blodget has doubts about how high AI-fueled companies can fly. He says it's too soon to tell if companies will be able to compete on a global scale.

news.title: China finds Nvidia broke antitrust law and extends probe. Its stock is dropping.
news.summary: The investigation centers around Nvidia’s acquisition of Mellanox Technology Co. Co. Nvidia is a leading supplier of graphics chips to the PC industry.

news.title: Google’s AI summaries are stealing traffic, publisher of Rolling Stone, Variety says in lawsuit
news.summary: Penske Media says Google’s search engine is cannibalizing its businesses. Penske Media filed a lawsuit against Google late Friday.
